description: Iris Haim wants the world to know her son died a free person.
maintext: Days after, Iris Haim recorded a message to the soldiers who killed her son, telling them she did not see his death as their fault. Speaking through tears, she explains her decision. "What happened, happened … we have enough suffering here," she said. "These soldiers also have families and mothers. I was also worried for them."
title: Mother of killed Israeli calls Hamas videos 'psychological warfare'
